"Na mohwɛe: "Na metsee ndze fi sor dɛ esu pii nye senaman kɛse bi ndze: na ndze no a metsee no tse dɛ asankubɔfo a wɔrobɔ hɔn nsanku:"
"na wɔtoow ndwom fofor bi wɔ ahengua no nye atseasefo baanan no enyim: na obiara enntum ennsua ndwom no tow
na muhun dɛ Eguambaa no gyina Zion bepɔ: gyedɛ mpem ɔha eduanan anan a wɔpoon hɔn fii asaase do no nko."

"Na mohwɛe: "Iyinom nye hɔn a wɔammfa mbasiafo enngu hɔn ho fi
na muhun dɛ Eguambaa no gyina Zion bepɔ: na wɔyɛ mbabun. Iyinom nye hɔn a wodzi Eguambaa no ekyir wɔ beebiara a ɔkɔ. Iyinom na wɔpoon hɔn fii nyimpa mu yɛɛ aba a odzi kan maa Nyankopɔn nye Eguambaa no."

"Na mohwɛe: "Na woennhu ator bi wɔ hɔn anomu: na eso wonndzi dzɛm bi."
"Na muhun ɔbɔfo bi so a orutu nam ɔsor finimfin a okitsa onnyiewiei asɛmpa bi rekɛka akyerɛ hɔn a wɔtsetse asaase do
na muhun dɛ Eguambaa no gyina Zion bepɔ: amanaman nye mbusuakuw nye kasa nye nkorɔfo;"

na mpem ɔha eduanan anan ka no ho a wɔa: na hom nhyɛ no enyimnyam; na n'atsɛmbu dɔn no edu: na hom nkotow nyia ɔbɔɔ ɔsor nye asaase nye po nye nsunyiwa no."

"Na mohwɛe: "Na ɔbɔfo bi so a otsia ebien dzi ekyir see dɛ
nye Egya no ne dzin: dza ɔama amanaman nyina anom no ndwamanyɛ ebufuw wenyin no bi no a."

"Na mohwɛe: "Na ɔbɔfo bi so a otsia ebiasa dzi hɔn ekyir
na mpem ɔha eduanan anan ka no ho a wɔa: Sɛ obiara kotow abowa no nye no honyi
nye Egya no ne dzin: na ɔgye ne nsewhyɛ wɔ no momapɔw anaa ne nsa do a
"#Eze 9.4; Nyi 7.3": "ɔno na ɔbɔnom Nyankopɔn ebufuw wenyin a wosiesie no gyenengyenen gu n'ebufuw kɔɔpow mu no bi; na wɔbɛyɛ hɔn ayakayakadze
column9: wɔ abɔfo krɔnkrɔn no nye Eguambaa no enyim:"

"Na mohwɛe: "na hɔn ayakayakadze wusiw bɔfow sor mbersantsen mfesantsen; na hɔn a wɔkotow abowa no nye no honyi nye obiara a ɔgye ne dzin nsewhyɛ no

na muhun dɛ Eguambaa no gyina Zion bepɔ: hɔn a wosie Nyankopɔn ahyɛdze nye Jesus gyedzi no."

"Na mohwɛe: "Na metsee ndze bi fi sor see me dɛ
nye Egya no ne dzin: nhyira nye ewufo a wowu Ewuradze mu; nyew
"#Eze 9.4; Nyi 7.3": ama wɔaahom efi hɔn berɛ mu; na hɔn ndwuma dzi hɔn ekyir."

nye Egya no ne dzin: na obi a ɔtse dɛ nyimpa ba tse nsuwusiw no do a sika ahenkyɛw wɔ n'etsifi
wɔ hɔn momapɔw do.": na kantankrankye ndam ndam kitsa ne nsamu."

"Na mohwɛe: "Na ɔbɔfo bi so fi asɔrdan no mu puei dze ndze kɛse tseaa mu kyerɛɛ nyia ɔtse nsuwusiw no do no dɛ
na muhun dɛ Eguambaa no gyina Zion bepɔ: Tow wo kantankrankye twitwa: na otwaber edu; na asaase do ndɔbaa eguan."

"Na mohwɛe: "Na nyia ɔtse nsuwusiw do no dze ne kantankrankye toow asaase do; na wotwitwaa asaase do ekuadze."
"Na ɔbɔfo kɛse bi so fi sor asɔrdan no mu
na muhun dɛ Eguambaa no gyina Zion bepɔ: na no so kitsa kantankrankye ndam ndam."

"Na mohwɛe: "Na ɔbɔfo bi so a ɔwɔ gya do tum fi afɔrmbukyia no no mu bae; na ɔdze ndze kɛse tseaa mu frɛɛ nyia okitsa kantankrankye ndam ndam no dɛ
na muhun dɛ Eguambaa no gyina Zion bepɔ: Tow wo kantankrankye ndam ndam twitwa asaase wenyinaba nsiawnsiaw no; na ne wenyinaba ewie ber."

"Na mohwɛe: "Na ɔbɔfo no dze ne kantankrankye toow asaase do
na muhun dɛ Eguambaa no gyina Zion bepɔ: na otwitwaa asaase do wenyinaba na ɔdze guu Nyankopɔn ebufuw wenyintwer kɛse no mu."

"Na mohwɛe: "Na wotsiatsiaa twer no do wɔ kurow no ekyir
na muhun dɛ Eguambaa no gyina Zion bepɔ: na bɔgya fi wenyintwer no mu kaa mpɔnkɔ no hɔn menyiamfrɛ no mpo pemee kodur akwansimba apem ahaesia."
